about_the_game:
"

Mind Fungus Tigers of the Wayward Moon

Mind Fungus Tigers of the Wayward Moon

BARDIC MISCHIEF - Drew "Jinjeet" Phillbrick

A Level One Adventure for the Shadowdark RPG


In the land of Eldoria, every thousand years, the heavens herald the return of the Wayward Moon, an ancient satellite said to harbor cosmic deities and untold power. Its latest approach has brought a wave of change; a mysterious fungal growth spreads through the world's forests, and with it, a creeping madness that ensnares the minds of all it touches.


You, brave adventurers, have been summoned by the esteemed Sage Elarion and the stoic Captain Helena of the Eldorian Guard to the town of Starfall, perched on the edge of the Whispering Woods. The town is abuzz with fear and speculation as the Wayward Moon looms ever closer in the night sky.


12 New Monsters!  Beautiful Maps!  Random Tables That Add Color To Your Game!  Challenging Encounters!  Interesting Puzzles And Traps!


 "Mind-Fungus Tigers from the Wayward Moon" was written to provide a structure in which the GM can work freely to create a custom experience for their players. You will find all of the adventure hooks, plot lines, NPCs, and locations necessary for interesting gameplay. You will also find rich descriptions of the game environment and encounter suggestions. The final encounter details are up to you as the Game Master. 

The adventure was written by Drew "Jinjeet" Phillbrick Maps were created using Dungeondraft. Images were created using Midjourney Ai.

"
